article_title: O'Malley says hospital CEOs help drive up health care costs

og.description: CHARLES CITY | Former Maryland governor Martin O'Malley said Friday one of the problems with rising health costs is hospital administrators who want to keep their beds filled.
og.title: O'Malley says hospital CEOs help drive up health care costs
